text: The carcass of a turtle weighing around 100 kg was washed ashore in Kanyakumari sea near the Aarattu Mandapam in the eastern gate of the Bhagavathy Amman Temple on Wednesday morning. The turtle might have been hit by a ship or a fishing boat while it was moving to the shore for laying eggs, sources said.
title: Turtle carcass washed ashore
